PL - Gra jako tako jest dalej ogrywana przez większość ludzi ze względu na jej cenę (kiedyś była a teraz nie) co przez moment zraziło mnie do tego tytułu, bo rzeczywiście toskyczna społeczność jest na niej wszechobecna. Jako zwolennik kary śmierci oraz edukacji militarnej polecam ten tytuł.

This game is still going strong 20 years later!

This game set the bar for years on team tactical death match, and continues to perform.

Good graphics, excellent game play, and plenty to do.

The only draw back is the community. It is really bad. Toxic players in most games, and a lot of poor sports.

Good game, it's really easy to understand how to play the game and it's so fun that you will probably accidentally stay awake for 5+ days! Super Mario 64 is easily one of my favorites. I'll rate this game 7/7 BowserSlayers.

É um Jogo de tiro e estratégia com muita variedade de armas e mapas. Muito divertido tanto jogando sério ou zoando. Porém evite atrapalhar o jogo dos outros, pois você evitará  cair em partidas com pessoas trolls e tóxicas. Obs: o jogo é bem mais divertido com amigos.
